p: HHP treatment destroys cell wall structures and enhances solvent permeability of the cells ( 10, 18). Therefore, HHP treatment of a raw danshen plant facilitates extraction of active principles via increased transfer of intracellular materials to the solvent. Raw danshen and HHP-pretreated danshen were extracted with the conventional boiling water extraction method ( Fig. 1A). The average extraction yield of HHP-treated danshen (0.97 ± 0.17) was about 1.3 times greater than that of raw danshen (0.72 ± 0.12) ( Fig. 1D). This result indicated that HHP treatment effectively increased extraction yield of active principles from raw danshen.
